document.full_text: china's communist party sees no reason why it cannot stay in power indefinitely, having made the nation into the envy of the world with its economic success, one of the party's top official historians said on thursday.
document.title: china says no expiry date on communist party rule
lines_and_colors: china's communist party sees no reason why it cannot stay in power indefinitely, having made the nation into the envy of the world with its economic success, one of the party's top official historians said on thursday.
